    • dispose

      public void dispose()
      Description copied from class: GameObjectContainer
      Disposes this game object instance and all of its children. Notice that if it has a parent, it will automatically detach this instance after the current cycle is executed.
      Specified by:
      dispose in interface org.pixel.commons.lifecycle.Disposable
      Overrides:
